item.title: Cardano, Solana, Polygon (MATIC) Under Selloff Pressure From Robinhood and Celsius
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Cardano (ADA), Solana (Solana), and Polygon (MATIC) facing a much-anticipated selloff from Robinhood Markets and Celsius. Robinhood will sell these cryptocurrencies on June 27, while Celsius to liquidate its crypto holdings over a period of time starting July 1. Robinhood is also laying off around 150 employees, 7% of its workforce, due to reduced trading

The post Cardano, Solana, Polygon (MATIC) Under Selloff Pressure From Robinhood and Celsius appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Stablecoin Issuer Circle Eyes for A Push in the Hong Kong Market
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
US-based stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Financial Ltd. is closely watching the current regulatory developments in Hong Kong as the region’s new crypto rules went into effect earlier this month, said Circle CEO Jeremy Allaire. While the US intensifies the regulatory crackdown, the Asian market remains a huge area of focus for crypto firms. Speaking at

item.title: Bomb Threat Scammers Demanding Bitcoin From US Stores -Report
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
United States retailers have recently come under attack from scammers sending bomb threats. Kroger, Target, Walmart and Amazon’s Whole Foods Market, and many others have all received these threats with the callers adding that they would detonate bombs if ransoms in the form of gift cards, Bitcoin (BTC) or money are not paid.  Retailers Bomb

The post Bomb Threat Scammers Demanding Bitcoin From US Stores -Report appeared first on CoinGape.

item.description:

item.title: Ethereum Price Analysis: $ETH Price Coiling Before a Robust Move; is $2000 Next Target?
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
Ethereum Price Analysis: The ongoing recovery rally in Ethereum price hits a major roadblock at $1926. In the last four days, the coin price showcased three failed attempts to surpass this barrier, indicating the sellers are actively defending this level. However, the buyers have not thrown towels yet and limited the downward projection to $1867.

The post Ethereum Price Analysis: $ETH Price Coiling Before a Robust Move; is $2000 Next Target? appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Ethereum Price Analysis: The ongoing recovery rally in Ethereum price hits a major roadblock at $1926. In the last four days, the coin price showcased three failed attempts to surpass this barrier, indicating the sellers are actively defending this level. However, the buyers have not thrown towels yet and limited the downward projection to $1867.

The post Ethereum Price Analysis: $ETH Price Coiling Before a Robust Move; is $2000 Next Target? appeared first on CoinGape.
